page.title: 04RECREATION-OUTDOOR.
page.content: Gardening is a popular outdoor activity in Greenock. There are annual gardening competitions. Each area holds heats and many people take part. The winners from these heats progress to a National Competition. Not everyone gardens competitively, many simply garden for pleasure or to help the household budget. For young people play schemes are organised during the summer. These schemes take place in St Lawrence's School and are run by the Tennants' Association. They take young people for day trips and also let them enter competitions. This is a good opportunity to meet people of the area, you can make friends with children from different schools. The Wellpark is popular with residents. Young people play there and old people walk there when the weather is good.
